newsitem.title: USA: Nynex Corp Q3 shr rises to $0.93.
newsitem.headline: Nynex Corp Q3 shr rises to $0.93.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)

NOTE: Results for both years adjusted for effects of the enhanced pension offer initiated in 1994. Third quarter 1996 after-tax charges were $13.9 million, or $0.03 per share. Third quarter 1995 charges were $23.7 million after taxes, or $0.06 per share.

The total number of employees leaving NYNEX under the offer through 1998 is now expected to be 19,000 to 20,000. After-tax charges in the range of $1.4 billion are to be recorded as employees accept the offer.

Third quarter 1995 results are also adjusted for net gains from sale of certain NYNEX Mobile Communications assets and actuarial changes in the NYNEX-Bell Atlantic cellular partnership, a change in presentation of certain taxes other than income, and other special charges. Net after-tax effect of these gains and charges was $0.2 million, or nil per share.
